caption.title: Systemic pre-exposure to SEB augments the primary NP 147-specific response following immunization with multiple IAV strains.
caption.p: Mice were injected i.p. with PBS or SEB followed, 3 days later, by i.p. immunization with WT or recombinant IAV strains expressing the same NP (A). These strains were NT60 (B), HK (C), X31 (D) and J-1 (E). Seven days after IAV inoculation, the absolute numbers of IFN-γ-producing epitope-specific T CD8 were calculated. Error bars represent SEM. * and ** denote significant differences with p<0.05 and p<0.01, respectively, using unpaired Student’s t-tests.
